channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'DOGE' meets Congress: GOP lawmaker launches caucus to help Musk take on 'Crazytown’

item.title: Judge strikes down Wyoming abortion laws, including explicit ban on pills to end pregnancy
item.description: A state judge on Monday struck down Wyoming's overall ban on abortion and its first-in-the-nation explicit prohibition on the use of medication to end...

item.title: The Price of Credit-Card Convenience Is Not a Matter for Big Government
item.description: It’s one for consumers and retailers.

item.title: Northeast Pennsylvania Needs Natural Gas
item.description: Energy production is the only way for the region to shake off the malaise of deindustrialization.

item.title: Bipartisan panel urges Congress to toss out decades of trade policy they say China has been exploiting

item.title: Texas proposal would give public schools the option to use Bible teachings in lessons
item.description: Texas public schools could use teachings from the Bible in lessons as an option for students from kindergarten through fifth grade under a proposal th...

item.title: Founder Of Breastfeeding Support Organization Resigns After Group Indulges Men’s ‘Chestfeeding’ Fantasies
item.description: One of the original founders of La Leche League resigned from the organization due to the inclusion of men in the organization’s mission.

item.title: Democrats in disarray: Growing field in race to chair party

item.title: Rep. Nancy Mace introduces resolution to ban transgender women from female restrooms in Capitol
item.description: Rep. Nancy Mace introduced a resolution Monday to prohibit transgender women from using female bathrooms at the Capitol.

item.title: Report: NY judge adjourns Trump hearing without explanation, delaying sentencing
item.description: Trump was convicted by a Manhattan jury on 34 felony counts of falsifying business records, which could have landed him up to four years in prison.

item.title: The Senate Should Assert Its Power to Block Bad Nominees
item.description: Trump’s nascent battle to undermine the power of the Senate is ultimately being waged in behalf of a false premise.

item.title: Report: Biden administration 'weaponized' Education Department to target Christian, career schools

item.title: The SAVE Act Could Hit Filibuster Wall In New Republican-Led Senate
item.description: 'The Democrats are not into compromising on issues that will cost them power,' Rep. Glenn Grothman said of the election integrity bill.

item.title: There’s No Such Thing as ‘Having It All’
item.description: A new report suggests major corporations view maximum flexibility as the most pro-woman benefits policy.

item.title: How To Dispel The Lies Most Americans Believe About Abortion
item.description: Shawn Carney and Steve Karlen’s guide is a clear and concise roadmap for pro-lifers looking to defend their stance and win hearts for good.

item.title: Unsanction Israel
item.description: Biden’s anti-Israel sanctions regime violates several standards of sanctions policy and threatens speech rights of Americans and in other democracies.

item.title: Report: Corporate America Would Rather Help Women Kill Their Babies Than Start A Family

item.title: Josh Shapiro Lies About Election Laws To Make Excuses For Counties Counting Invalid Ballots
item.description: Shapiro's misleading statement wasn't just a failure of leadership — it is a betrayal of the trust that voters place in their elected officials.
